body:
**8 issues found** across 40 files

<details>
<summary>Prompt for AI agents (all 8 issues)</summary>

~~~

Understand the root cause of the following 8 issues and fix them.


<file name="public/js/components/FormInput.js">

<violation number="1" location="public/js/components/FormInput.js:102">
Without forwarding $attrs to the <input>, attributes like disabled, maxlength, or aria-* stay on the wrapper div instead of the control, so consumers cannot configure standard input behavior or accessibility. Please bind $attrs on the input to keep the component usable.</violation>
</file>

<file name="public/js/components/ExpenseDashboard.js">

<violation number="1" location="public/js/components/ExpenseDashboard.js:22">
`export default` in this browser script will throw a syntax error, so the ExpenseDashboard component never registers.</violation>
</file>

<file name="public/js/components/ReportsCarousel.js">

<violation number="1" location="public/js/components/ReportsCarousel.js:21">
The component only exposes a `reportSlots` prop, but the updated home view still supplies the data via `:slides`, so this prop always stays empty and the carousel renders no reports.</violation>
</file>

<file name="public/js/components/DepartmentPostSelector.js">

<violation number="1" location="public/js/components/DepartmentPostSelector.js:97">
Guard against stale async responses: if a slower fetch for a previous department resolves after the user has picked another department, this assignment overwrites the posts list with stale data. Add a check that the fetched department still matches `currentDepartmentId` before mutating state.</violation>
</file>

<file name="public/js/components/StatsDashboard.js">

<violation number="1" location="public/js/components/StatsDashboard.js:171">
Managers who first appear after the earliest date never get plotted because managerNames is derived solely from the first label; please collect manager keys across all dates so every manager with data renders.</violation>

<violation number="2" location="public/js/components/StatsDashboard.js:308">
Report charts drop entire metric series whenever the earliest date lacks that key because datasets are sourced from data[labels[0]]. Iterate the metricLabels keys instead so each configured metric always renders.</violation>
</file>

<file name="public/js/components/DataTable.js">

<violation number="1" location="public/js/components/DataTable.js:264">
The pagination guard blocks returning to valid pages when totalPages decreases, leaving the table stuck on an empty page after data shrinks.</violation>
</file>

<file name="public/js/components/ServiceReport.js">

<violation number="1" location="public/js/components/ServiceReport.js:112">
The column header text is misspelled; please correct "–ù–∞–≤–∑–∞–Ω–∏—è" to "–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è" to avoid confusing users.</violation>
</file>
~~~
